import { Form } from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./BillingDetailForm.module.css"; const BillingDetailForm = () => { return ( <>

Billing details

); }; export default BillingDetailForm; export function action({ request, params }) { const data = request.formData(); const billingDetail = { name: data.get("full-name"), email: data.get("email"), phone: data.get("phone"), address: data.get("address"), }; window.alert( `Your order is done : /nName : ${billingDetail.name} /nEmail : ${billingDetail.email}` ); }
